feed.title: Ivory Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.42
entry.content: • Fix issues for iOS 18, iPadOS 18 and macOS Sequoia

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.43
entry.content:
• Fix various issues with images not loading.
  • Various performance improvements.
  • Add an option to delete the avatar and header image in the profile editor.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.44
entry.content:
• Trending Links tab becomes News.
  • You can now tap on the “X Posts” button to see a timeline of posts containing the same link. This is a great way to see a conversation and opinions around a link.
  • Link author attribution will be displayed if available.
  • Various bug fixes and localization improvements.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.45
entry.content:
• Add gradient to quickly parse posts from followed tags & boost in your home timeline.
  • If an image upload fails, you can now tap to see the error.
  • Better link attribution UI.
  • Various bug fixes & performance improvements.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.46
entry.content:
• New alternative icons made by the community.
  • Add context menus for images in the image viewer.
  • Posts in the timeline are now draggable.
  • Various bug fixes & localization improvements.
